      • initRandomCas

        public static void initRandomCas(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas aJCas,
                                 int aTextSize,
                                 int aAnnotationCount,
                                 long aSeed)
        Initializes a CAS with random text, tokens, and sentences.
        Parameters:
        aJCas - the CAS
        aTextSize - the length of the text to be generated.
        aAnnotationCount - the number of annotations to be generated.
        aSeed - the random seed to allow for repeatable randomness.
